thread.title: Cubs hit 6 home runs, top Cardinals 8-6 for 2-1 lead in NLDS
thread.title_full: Cubs hit 6 home runs, top Cardinals 8-6 for 2-1 lead in NLDS

title: Cubs hit 6 home runs, top Cardinals 8-6 for 2-1 lead in NLDS
text:
> Top News Cubs hit 6 home runs, top Cardinals 8-6 for 2-1 lead in NLDS Chicago Cubs starting pitcher Jake Arrieta (49) watches from the dugout after leaving the game during the seventh inning of Game 3 in baseball's National League Division Series against the St. Louis Cardinals, Monday, Oct. 12, 2015, in Chicago.
